tool_description: Get some useful infos about CSGO, like item prices and the hottest reddit investments discussions
name: Useful CSGO - Counter Strike
title: Useful CSGO - Counter Strike

api_list.name: Reddit hot discussions
api_list.description: Get the latest Hot Reddit discussions of r/csgomarketforum
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://useful-csgo-counter-strike.p.rapidapi.com/reddit/hot"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "useful-csgo-counter-strike.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Valid Item
api_list.description: Check if item is valid CSGO Item

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "useful-csgo-counter-strike.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Item price

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://useful-csgo-counter-strike.p.rapidapi.com/item/{currency}/{item}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "useful-csgo-counter-strike.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
